import React, { FunctionComponent, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, RouteComponentProps } from 'react-router-dom'; import User from '../models/user'; import voiduser from '../models/void-user'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; import getCurrent from '../api-request/user/get-current'; interface Props extends RouteComponentProps<{ id: string }> { usercalled: User } const UserSettings: FunctionComponent = ({ match, usercalled }) => { const [EditPseudo, setEditPseudo] = useState(true); const [EditMail, setEditMail] = useState(true); const [EditPassWord, setEditPassWord] = useState(true); const [EditDelete, setEditDelete] = useState(true); const [user, setUser] = useState(usercalled); useEffect(() => { setUser(user) }, [match.params.id, usercalled]) var test = { 'test:' : 2 } console.log(test) return (
